name: Tower Defense > Red Rose Rising
description:
An (almost) idle Tower Defense
Tower Defense - Red Rose Rising: Assemble a team of soldiers and protect miss Red Rose from the perils of her journey with tower defense strategies!

A fast-paced tower defense game featuring 8 classes of soldiers, 3 upgradable skills and 10 different enemies.

This is a classic tower defense casual game with waves of monsters that need to be stopped.

Enjoy 40 levels of pure fun and periodic gifts with one of the best tower defense games ever!A new perspective
Let's just say hard-to-master tower defense games are not our cup of tea. This TD was built with only one goal in mid: kill the zombies and finish the game fast!!1

If you enjoy running through a tower defense game, this is perfect for you!
